subject: Thinking of improving the auto generation of test cases
msgSnippet: Hi all, I am currently working on auto generation of test cases for TDD for my honors year project. And was considering modifying JUnit such that it will auto
messageBody:
Hi all,

I am currently working on auto generation of test cases for TDD for
my honors year project. And was considering modifying JUnit such
that it will auto generate some test cases based values flagged by
users.

E.g.,
Public boolean isLegalInt(int x){
/* input - 0 < x < 10, result - True*/

}
given a comment like the above will generate assert statements such
as
assertFalse(isLegalInt(0));
assertTrue(isLegalInt(1));
assertTrue(isLegalInt(9));
assertFalse(isLegalInt(10));

Thus, I am trying to locate the source code that generates the
testclass template to implement the changes and I can't seem to find
it anywhere. Any help would be greatly appreciated thankyou.

p.s I am currently working with Junit 3.8.1

Regards,
Jimm
